类 TransportTasksAction<OperationTask extends Task,​TasksRequest extends BaseTasksRequest<TasksRequest>,​TasksResponse extends BaseTasksResponse,​TaskResponse extends Writeable>

  • 直接已知子类:
    TransportCancelTasksAction, TransportListTasksAction
    public abstract class TransportTasksAction<OperationTask extends Task,​TasksRequest extends BaseTasksRequest<TasksRequest>,​TasksResponse extends BaseTasksResponse,​TaskResponse extends Writeable>
extends HandledTransportAction<TasksRequest,​TasksResponse>
    The base class for transport actions that are interacting with currently running tasks.

      • taskOperation

        protected abstract void taskOperation​(TasksRequest request,

                                      ActionListener<TaskResponse> listener)
        Perform the required operation on the task. It is OK start an asynchronous operation or to throw an exception but not both.
